name: qTranslate remove one language menu item
author: Ronny Sherer

sections.description:
For example if you remove the French title for a page:
Company Profile
Without our plugin, you will get in French a menu with the following title: Company Profile (English)
This plugin will totally remove the menu item.
sections.installation:
1. Upload qtranslate-remove-menu-item to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
    That’s it. It works. No settings needed.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

short_description: Remove untranslated menu items from menu by simply removing the language string. Use when a menu should appear in one language only.
description:
For example if you remove the French title for a page:
Company Profile
Without our plugin, you will get in French a menu with the following title: Company Profile (English)
This plugin will totally remove the menu item.
